TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Jianshi, title = Jianshi, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jianshi} }

S.FORM: Jianshi Jianshi a sakuwan ku Hsinchu. kumud nu kalesakan, 522.98 km². (kalesakan nu linpanti 397.38 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 114.53 km²), u kasabinawlan, 9,456 ku tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, 2,825 ku luma'. ilabu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, 8,569 ku yincumin a tademaw. u kasabinawlan, pakalatu 91% (Tayal) ku kasabinawlan. u Tayal ku sakalaniyazu'. nikasakuwakuwan Jianshi mala 7 a cuwen atu 49 ku niyazu'. kina 49 a niyazu'sa, Mkzihing , Mkmatuy , Piling , Paqiy , Yutak , Kbaqeh , Cinbulan , Kuxan , Ageq , Micista , Mknahuy , Mksuzing , Mklapay , Lkuxan , Hbun-Rangay , Mkslaq , Qwayux , Hbun-Qramay , Pololan , Uraw , Libu , Llyung , Ulay , Batul , Mami , Quri , Plmwan , Tayax , Ponaway , Smangus , Thyakan , Smangus , Cinsbu , Yuluw , Gowryu , Rahaw , Cyocuy , Hbun kramay , Hbun-tunan , Kin lwan , Qolu , Qyuws , Hbun-lesa , Metapay , M'yutak , Mrmurak , Spwan , Melukux , Metuiy . kakitidaan kitidaan Jianshi "Taywan ngayngay a kamu hay-lu a ngalngal, ziamˋ shag˙ hiongˋ, Atayal, Nahuy, idai Taywan Sin-cuku sakawaliyan timulan, atu Wufeng malecad tu Sin-cuku a san-ti' niyadu', ahebal nu ka kitidaan han 527.5795 pin-fan-kun-li, u Sin-cuku satabakiay saahebalay nu sin-cen-ciu . labu nu talakaw han makaala tu tusa a lasubu (200) tusa atu tusa a malebut (2000) kun-ce, angangan nu muenengay u Taywan yincumin a binacadan "Atayal a binacadan", atu ngayngay a tademaw. ilabu nu niyadu' talakaw han makaal tu cacay a malebut lima a lasubu (1500) katukuh tulu a malebut (3000) a kun-ce kilangkilangan nami. nu amisan u sasinganganay nu santi a niyadu'. ni kasinganganan namakayda i niyadu'ay tu Naluo sauwac , Ciw-le sawac kapulungan malikid nu nanum masamutidengay nu madicemay a tebue' nu ba'tu. . haylu a ngalngal nu angayangay, singangan nacu tu hay-lu-pin, nu layak a bninacadan nu ngayngay a sakacacay nu kakamuwan, tadaangangan nuheni i tida mapahelak i Cung-kuo kuan-tung-sen san-wi-se , atu Taywan a ngayngayan a niyadu'. Jianshi amisan mitulin tu kun-si-cen , wali amis sibiyaw tu Taw-yun-se fu-sinciu , waliyan sibiyaw tu I-lansen Ta-tun niyadu' , timulan mitulin tu Miw-li-kin Tay-an niyadu' , nutipan sibiyaw tu Wu-eng , hen-san niyadu' . i nabuyu' idaw ku nika babenis tu nuayawan a buyu', nikudan a buhu' nu tusaay a kakitidaan, nuayawan a buyu' idaw ku Sin-le' , Cia-le' , Cin-pin , I'-sin atu Ma-hua-u lima a niyadu'an, nikudan a buyu' idaw ku I'-fun atu Siw-lun tusa a niyadu'an, naw Atayal a tadaniyadu'an, idaw ku Takicin sauwac atu Sa-ke-ya sauwac . Ta-ke'-cin sauwac nu tukusay a nanum sabataday nu misilsilay a nanum nu sabataday nu anganganan a nanum, kalinatuan u Pin-tan buyu' nu amisan, Sake'-ya-cin sauwac i tida i Tapa'-cin abuyu'an nu amisan, atu Ta-ke'ya-cin sauwac misilsilay katukuh i Siw-lun malalitemuh mala Ma-like'-wan sauwac , u luma'nu lunung atu se-pan a butingan. Ce-yu buyu' Ce-yu buyu' , idawaca ku ngangan u I'-luo-fu buyu' itida i Taywan Tay-cun-se'hepin kitidaan lisan-li atu Sin-cu-kin Jianshi siw-luon a niyadu'an nu laad, u Tay-wan sasinganganay a buyu', u Tay-wan a cacay a lasubu nu buyu'an, silesilen a singangan han sakalima a bataan idaw ku tusa (52) a buyu'. Ce-yu buyu' talakaw han tulu a malebut tulu a lasubu idaw ku tulu (3303) a kun-ce, tuduh han idaw ku tulu a malecaday nu tuluay a kalimucu' a sasulitan, u Siy-san a babuyu'an , Wulin nu sepat a bangacalay nu buyu'an,tungduh nu buyu nutipan a lutuklutukan idaw ku Sin-ta-ce , Ya-ma-ce atu Pin-tan-ce nu pinaay a talakaway nu buyu' a sasawacan, nikasinganganan. pangangan han nu Atayal u "Tamarappu" ngalngal misegitu Tama-lapu-san , Zipun nipibelihan u I'-luo-fu buyu' . Ceyu-buyu' nutipan han u Pin-tan buyu' , waliyan mitulin tu Taw-san , Se-lun buyu' atu Ke'-la-ya buyu' . Sia-ke'-luo a kawaw, nika sikawaw itini i Zipunan nu Taywan a yincumin nu kalepacawan anika adaan nu kawaw, kasikawawan i tini i Sin-cuku Jianshi . sakasikawaw u Taywan Cun-du cuo-ciu-cin-cuo-matay itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan (1910) katukuh i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku sepat (1914) a mihcaan mitaneng tu limaay a mihcaan ni kasikiyakuwan a kawaw, milihida tu Taywan amisan nu buyu' a yincumin kinapina micumud misawacu, mialaw tu kuwan a tutuudan atu mikuwan kelec nu kakawaw atu a pakalaluwayluway amisa lihalay muculil mipenec misanai' tu tademaw. . kalingesantu nu niyadu'ay a yincumin, macunus aca nu niyaniyadu'ay anikasasuada nu niyadu'ay tu malumanay a linges atu kainaian nu laheci a balucu', sisa linga tu satu idaw kuni kasasuadaan a malalebu. Jianshi u Sin-cu satabakiay a ahebalay nu lala' a niyadu'an, u kapulungan nu yincumin a niyadu' nu kupulungan a kakitidaan, Jianshi sakanamuhan bangcalay nu aadihan nu kilakilangan, kaydaan muculil bangcal sa adihen. milakuyt tu kacinlawan nu Na-wan , maka tukuh tu itini i Jianshi . makatukuh i Jianshi , kanca milakalak tu bangcal nu pe-ciw nu mapacacuyan a kayakay, dumaan a tapiingan nu mapacacuyan a kayakay han idaw ku tatanaman tu Hunpeciw kafa tatanaman, mutaydaay a tademaw kanca musaluimeng. saka enem a balubaluan mahida miculimekay i kilakilangan nu buyubuyu'an, langdawsa adihen ku balubaluan, tayniay nu mukanay a tademaw, kanca miadih tu bangcal nu pala, mahida u ahemaw ku udipudipan numita. Hun-cin-wi u Jianshi sakasingangan nu aidangan, picidekan un kulitkulitan a luma', madateng kita tu nu buyubuyu'an a nalimaan nu bangcal, nu caaya kaw cinlaway a lihalayan nu kakitidaan idaw ku nikulitan atu kasi icelangan nu demiad. talakaw makaala tu cacay a malebut tusa a lasubu (1200) a kun-ce u tapukuwan ku tataydaan a midang, makatukuh tu sakatapabaw i adawangan, tada maadih tu ku bangcal a buyubuyu'an atu masa babuybabuya a laden mahida i matamataan numita a madateng. Sin-cu baluhay aaidangan Jianshi balaud nisilesilan tu ba'tu a tapukuwan nu caculilan, Sin-cu nu masacacayay a galasu taneng mutideng ini masabahelay itida i sawuac nu galasu a enalan, miadih ku Na-luo sauwac tunika sedaysa nu cascas atu bangcal nu sauwac a aadihan, madayuman katukuh han nu kilangkilangan a caculilan u sakapahay nu tataydaan a muculil.

Jianshi Jianshi a sakowan ko Hsincho. komod no kalesakan, 522.98 km². (kalesakan no linpanti 397.38 km², kalesakan no pawliwti 114.53 km²), o kasabinawlan, 9,456 ko tademaw. o kasalomaloma' sa, 2,825 ko loma'. ilabo no kasaniyazo' no siyang sa, 8,569 ko yincomin a tademaw. o kasabinawlan, pakalato 91% (Tayal) ko kasabinawlan. o Tayal ko sakalaniyazo'. nikasakowakowan Jianshi mala 7 a cowen ato 49 ko niyazo'. kina 49 a niyazo'sa, Mkzihing , Mkmatoy , Piling , Paqiy , Yotak , Kbaqeh , Cinbolan , Koxan , Ageq , Micista , Mknahoy , Mksozing , Mklapay , Lkoxan , Hbon-Rangay , Mkslaq , Qwayox , Hbon-Qramay , Pololan , Uraw , Libo , Llyong , Ulay , Batol , Mami , Qori , Plmwan , Tayax , Ponaway , Smangos , Thyakan , Smangos , Cinsbo , Yolow , Gowryo , Rahaw , Cyocoy , Hbon kramay , Hbon-tonan , Kin lwan , Qolo , Qyows , Hbon-lesa , Metapay , M'yotak , Mrmorak , Spwan , Melokox , Metoiy . kakitidaan kitidaan Jianshi "Taywan ngayngay a kamo hay-lo a ngalngal, ziamˋ shag˙ hiongˋ, Atayal, Nahoy, idai Taywan Sin-coko sakawaliyan timolan, ato Wofeng malecad to Sin-coko a san-ti' niyado', ahebal no ka kitidaan han 527.5795 pin-fan-kon-li, o Sin-coko satabakiay saahebalay no sin-cen-cio . labo no talakaw han makaala to tosa a lasobo (200) tosa ato tosa a malebot (2000) kon-ce, angangan no moenengay o Taywan yincomin a binacadan "Atayal a binacadan", ato ngayngay a tademaw. ilabo no niyado' talakaw han makaal to cacay a malebot lima a lasobo (1500) katokoh tolo a malebot (3000) a kon-ce kilangkilangan nami. no amisan o sasinganganay no santi a niyado'. ni kasinganganan namakayda i niyado'ay to Naloo saowac , Ciw-le sawac kapolongan malikid no nanom masamotidengay no madicemay a teboe' no ba'to. . haylo a ngalngal no angayangay, singangan naco to hay-lo-pin, no layak a bninacadan no ngayngay a sakacacay no kakamowan, tadaangangan noheni i tida mapahelak i Cong-koo koan-tong-sen san-wi-se , ato Taywan a ngayngayan a niyado'. Jianshi amisan mitolin to kon-si-cen , wali amis sibiyaw to Taw-yon-se fo-sincio , waliyan sibiyaw to I-lansen Ta-ton niyado' , timolan mitolin to Miw-li-kin Tay-an niyado' , notipan sibiyaw to Wo-eng , hen-san niyado' . i naboyo' idaw ko nika babenis to noayawan a boyo', nikodan a boho' no tosaay a kakitidaan, noayawan a boyo' idaw ko Sin-le' , Cia-le' , Cin-pin , I'-sin ato Ma-hoa-o lima a niyado'an, nikodan a boyo' idaw ko I'-fon ato Siw-lon tosa a niyado'an, naw Atayal a tadaniyado'an, idaw ko Takicin saowac ato Sa-ke-ya saowac . Ta-ke'-cin saowac no tokosay a nanom sabataday no misilsilay a nanom no sabataday no anganganan a nanom, kalinatoan o Pin-tan boyo' no amisan, Sake'-ya-cin saowac i tida i Tapa'-cin aboyo'an no amisan, ato Ta-ke'ya-cin saowac misilsilay katokoh i Siw-lon malalitemoh mala Ma-like'-wan saowac , o loma'no lonong ato se-pan a botingan. Ce-yo boyo' Ce-yo boyo' , idawaca ko ngangan o I'-loo-fo boyo' itida i Taywan Tay-con-se'hepin kitidaan lisan-li ato Sin-co-kin Jianshi siw-loon a niyado'an no laad, o Tay-wan sasinganganay a boyo', o Tay-wan a cacay a lasobo no boyo'an, silesilen a singangan han sakalima a bataan idaw ko tosa (52) a boyo'. Ce-yo boyo' talakaw han tolo a malebot tolo a lasobo idaw ko tolo (3303) a kon-ce, todoh han idaw ko tolo a malecaday no toloay a kalimoco' a sasolitan, o Siy-san a baboyo'an , Wolin no sepat a bangacalay no boyo'an,tongdoh no boyo notipan a lotoklotokan idaw ko Sin-ta-ce , Ya-ma-ce ato Pin-tan-ce no pinaay a talakaway no boyo' a sasawacan, nikasinganganan. pangangan han no Atayal o "Tamarappo" ngalngal misegito Tama-lapo-san , Zipon nipibelihan o I'-loo-fo boyo' . Ceyo-boyo' notipan han o Pin-tan boyo' , waliyan mitolin to Taw-san , Se-lon boyo' ato Ke'-la-ya boyo' . Sia-ke'-loo a kawaw, nika sikawaw itini i Ziponan no Taywan a yincomin no kalepacawan anika adaan no kawaw, kasikawawan i tini i Sin-coko Jianshi . sakasikawaw o Taywan Con-do coo-cio-cin-coo-matay itini i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan (1910) katokoh i cacay a malebot siwa a lasobo cacay a bataan idaw ko sepat (1914) a mihcaan mitaneng to limaay a mihcaan ni kasikiyakowan a kawaw, milihida to Taywan amisan no boyo' a yincomin kinapina micomod misawaco, mialaw to kowan a totoodan ato mikowan kelec no kakawaw ato a pakalalowayloway amisa lihalay mocolil mipenec misanai' to tademaw. . kalingesanto no niyado'ay a yincomin, maconos aca no niyaniyado'ay anikasasoada no niyado'ay to malomanay a linges ato kainaian no laheci a baloco', sisa linga to sato idaw koni kasasoadaan a malalebo. Jianshi o Sin-co satabakiay a ahebalay no lala' a niyado'an, o kapolongan no yincomin a niyado' no kopolongan a kakitidaan, Jianshi sakanamohan bangcalay no aadihan no kilakilangan, kaydaan mocolil bangcal sa adihen. milakoyt to kacinlawan no Na-wan , maka tokoh to itini i Jianshi . makatokoh i Jianshi , kanca milakalak to bangcal no pe-ciw no mapacacoyan a kayakay, domaan a tapiingan no mapacacoyan a kayakay han idaw ko tatanaman to Honpeciw kafa tatanaman, motaydaay a tademaw kanca mosaloimeng. saka enem a balobaloan mahida micolimekay i kilakilangan no boyoboyo'an, langdawsa adihen ko balobaloan, tayniay no mokanay a tademaw, kanca miadih to bangcal no pala, mahida o ahemaw ko odipodipan nomita. Hon-cin-wi o Jianshi sakasingangan no aidangan, picidekan on kolitkolitan a loma', madateng kita to no boyoboyo'an a nalimaan no bangcal, no caaya kaw cinlaway a lihalayan no kakitidaan idaw ko nikolitan ato kasi icelangan no demiad. talakaw makaala to cacay a malebot tosa a lasobo (1200) a kon-ce o tapokowan ko tataydaan a midang, makatokoh to sakatapabaw i adawangan, tada maadih to ko bangcal a boyoboyo'an ato masa baboybaboya a laden mahida i matamataan nomita a madateng. Sin-co balohay aaidangan Jianshi balaod nisilesilan to ba'to a tapokowan no cacolilan, Sin-co no masacacayay a galaso taneng motideng ini masabahelay itida i sawoac no galaso a enalan, miadih ko Na-loo saowac tonika sedaysa no cascas ato bangcal no saowac a aadihan, madayoman katokoh han no kilangkilangan a cacolilan o sakapahay no tataydaan a mocolil.
